Topics.title: Accessible and Safe Public Spaces
Topics.description: Develop technology-driven solutions that ensure that public spaces within cities are accessible and safe for women and girls, addressing issues like lighting, security, and transportation.

Topics.title: Urban Mobility
Topics.description: Create intelligent transportation systems that provide equitable access to transportation options, reduce emissions, and cater to the specific needs of women and diverse populations.

Topics.title: Climate-Resilient Infrastructure
Topics.description: Innovate urban infrastructure designs and technologies that withstand the challenges posed by climate change, with a particular focus on how these improvements can positively impact gender dynamics.

Topics.title: Waste Management and Sustainability
Topics.description: Develop smart solutions for efficient waste management and recycling that promote environmental sustainability and empower women through income-generating opportunities.

Topics.title: Climate Education and Awareness in Cities
Topics.description: Create apps or campaigns that educate urban residents about climate change, its impacts on the city, and how gender-specific issues are addressed within the urban climate context.

Topics.title: Urban Green Spaces
Topics.description: Enhance access to and maintenance of urban green spaces that contribute to climate resilience and improve the overall quality of life for women and communities.

Topics.title: Affordable Housing
Topics.description: Address affordable and sustainable housing solutions that are inclusive, energy-efficient, and designed to meet the specific needs of women and their families.

Topics.title: Disaster Preparedness
Topics.description: Challenge participants to develop solutions that enhance urban disaster preparedness, including early warning systems, evacuation plans, and disaster shelters designed to be inclusive and safe for women and vulnerable populations.

Topics.title: Emergency Response Technologies
Topics.description: Promote the creation of technologies that improve emergency response during and after natural disasters, ensuring the protection and support of all urban residents, especially women and children.

Topics.title: Interdisciplinary Disaster Resilience
Topics.description: Promote interdisciplinary collaboration among STEM professionals, social scientists, and urban planners to create holistic solutions that address natural disaster risks while considering gender equality, climate action, and urban sustainability.
